stimulusHtml: Assume a country has ample reserves in its banking system. Which combination of monetary and fiscal policies will necessarily reduce the price level in the short run?
choicesHtml: Selling bonds through open-market operations and increasing government spending
Increasing administered interest rates and decreasing government spending
Buying bonds through open-market operations and leaving government spending unchanged
Decreasing administered interest rates and decreasing government spending
Decreasing the policy rate and increasing government spending
